foreignData.name: Verfroschen
foreignData.text: Bis zum Ende des Zuges verliert eine Kreatur deiner Wahl alle Fähigkeiten und wird zu einem blauen Frosch mit Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft 1/1.

foreignData.name: Convertir en rana
foreignData.text: Hasta el final del turno, la criatura objetivo pierde todas sus habilidades y se convierte en una Rana azul con fuerza y resistencia base 1/1.

foreignData.name: Transformation en grenouille
foreignData.text: Jusqu'à la fin du tour, la créature ciblée perd toutes ses capacités et devient une grenouille bleue avec une force et une endurance de base de 1/1.

foreignData.name: Tramutare in Rana
foreignData.text: Fino alla fine del turno, una creatura bersaglio perde tutte le abilità e diventa una Rana blu con forza e costituzione base 1/1.

foreignData.name: 蛙変化
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それはすべての能力を失うとともに基本のパワーとタフネスが１/１の青のカエルになる。

foreignData.name: 개구리로 변신
foreignData.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 모든 능력을 잃고 기본 공격력 및 방어력이 1/1인 청색 개구리가 된다.

foreignData.name: Transformar em Sapo
foreignData.text: Até o final do turno, a criatura alvo perde todas as habilidades e torna-se um Sapo azul com 1/1 de poder e resistência básicos.

foreignData.name: Превращение в Лягушку
foreignData.text: До конца хода целевое существо теряет все способности и становится синей Лягушкой с базовыми силой и выносливостью 1/1.

foreignData.name: 化蛙术
foreignData.text: 直到回合结束，目标生物失去所有异能，且成为基础力量与防御力为1/1的蓝色蛙。

foreignData.name: 化蛙術
foreignData.text: 直到回合結束，目標生物失去所有異能，且成為基礎力量與防禦力為1/1的藍色蛙。

name: Turn to Frog
originalText: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

rulings.text: The creature will lose all other colors and creature types, but it will retain any other card types (such as artifact) or supertypes (such as legendary) it may have.

Turn to Frog overwrites all previous effects that set the creature’s base power and toughness to specific values. Any power- or toughness-setting effects that start to apply after Turn to Frog resolves will overwrite this effect.

Turn to Frog doesn’t counter abilities that have already triggered or been activated. In particular, there is no way to cast this spell to stop a creature’s ability that says “At the beginning of your upkeep,” “When this creature enters the battlefield,” or similar from triggering.
If the affected creature gains an ability after Turn to Frog resolves, it will keep that ability.

Effects that modify a creature’s power and/or toughness, such as the effect of Titanic Growth, will apply to the creature no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for any counters that change its power and/or toughness and effects that switch its power and toughness.

If one of the Theros block Gods is affected by Turn to Frog, it will be a legendary 1/1 blue Frog enchantment creature with no abilities. If it stops being a creature, perhaps because your devotion to its color(s) decreased, it will be a legendary blue enchantment with no abilities. The way continuous effects work, the God’s type-changing ability is applied before the effect that removes that ability is applied.

text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.
